promptPrefix:
Act as a Summarizer.

Summarize the problems mention in a [PROMPT] in bulletpoints in [English] and mention how many number of time each problem is repeating.

Suggest the Solution based on the problems in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

Prioritize in providing solution of those problems repeating higher number of times.

Example

Long shoes are not suitable for shoe organizers

You need to understand the design of the product and based on the utility suggest the solution.
title: Amazon Product Review Analyzer.
